original_text:
This is what the Lord says—
    he who made a way through the sea,
    a path through the mighty waters,
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이같이 말하노라 바다 가운데에 길을, 큰 물 가운데에 지름길을 내고

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says
he who made a way through the sea
a path through the mighty waters
sentences.korean_translation: 강한 물들을 통해 길을 만드신 분
